item.title: Amazon VPC CNI x Cilium
item.description: In this hybrid mode, the Amazon VPC CNI is responsible for setting up the virtual network devices as well as for IP address management (IPAM) via ENIs.

item.description: Container Network Inteface Plugin using elastic network interfaces on AWS. #aws Overlay network The first one is the overlay network used for communication and encapsulating the packets over the network.

item.title: Cilium
item.description: Cilium is an open source project to provide networking, security and observability for Kubernetes cluster an other container orchestration platforms.

item.title: Container Network Interface plugin
item.description: Kubernetes does not implement such things as mulit-host networking (i.e. Pod-to-Pod communication across nodes). The Container Network Interface (CNI) is a framework for dynamically configuring network resources.

item.title: Network policies
item.description: Kubernetes Network policies are an application-centric construct which allow you to specify how a pod is allowed to communicate with various network “entities” (endpoints, services) over the network.

item.title: NiFiKop
item.description: It is is an open-source Kubernetes operator that makes it easy to run Apache NiFi on Kubernetes.
